brand.name: Rescue Home Offers
brand.niche: Real estate solutions for distressed homes and distressed homeowners
brand.description: Rescue Home Offers provides instant offers to homeowners with 11+ different solutions - from traditional listings to fix-and-flip partnerships, cash offers, subject-to agreements, seller financing, and creative solutions. Serving motivated sellers dealing with everything from standard home sales to distressed situations (foreclosure, divorce, probate, inherited properties, tired landlords, property damage). Local focus in Las Vegas, NV with 20+ years experience since 2004.

audience.ideal_customer: Distressed homeowners (facing foreclosure, divorce, probate, tired landlords, job relocation) AND distressed home owners (properties needing major repairs, outdated, structural issues, fire/water damage, hoarder situations) - plus strategic sellers who just want the best deal in Las Vegas, NV
pain_points: Facing foreclosure or behind on mortgage payments
Going through divorce or separation and need to sell
Inherited property through probate they can't afford or don't want
Tired landlord ready to be done with rental properties
Job relocation with tight timeline to sell
Home needs major repairs they can't afford
Property has structural issues, fire/water/storm damage
Hoarder situation or estate cleanout needed
Only getting 1-2 options from other investors (lowball cash or traditional listing)
Bad credit making it hard to move forward
Need cash fast but don't want to get ripped off
audience.desired_outcome: Get fair treatment, see ALL their options (not just 1-2), and find a solution that fits their unique situation - whether that's getting out from under the property stress or finding a creative solution that works for them

voice.tone: Direct, no-BS, Gen X, transparent, educational
voice.personality: A seasoned real estate pro who's seen it all and tells it straight - no fluff, no pressure, just solutions. Like a trusted advisor who's been in the trenches for 20+ years.
examples: No home should go to the courthouse steps.
Your price, our terms. Your terms, our price.
We're Gen X. We get stuff done.
Listen, we get it. You're here because you have a problem. We're not trying to convince you of that—you already know.
We're not here to lowball you. We're here to show you all the options.
